content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
The structure appears to be a train-like construction with two distinct parts:
1. Left section (like a locomotive):
- Base: Blue blocks with yellow connector
- Middle: Orange cylindrical tower with triangular supports
- Top: Red block with yellow domed tops

2. Right section (like train cars):
- Base: Red arched blocks
- Middle: Various colored blocks (blue, green, yellow, orange)
- Top: Yellow domed pieces

Block count per layer:
- Bottom layer: Blue blocks, red arched blocks
- Middle layer: Yellow, orange, and colored cubic blocks
- Top layer: Domed pieces and tall blocks

Assembly Order:
{
Step1: Move block with index 3 (blue cube - left base)
Step2: Move block with index 6 (blue cube - left base)
Step3: Move block with index 8 (yellow horizontal block - connector)
Step4: Move block with index 1 (red arch - right base)
Step5: Move block with index 1 (red arch - right base again)
Step6: Move block with index 15 (orange triangle support)
Step7: Move block with index 16 (orange triangle support)
Step8: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder)
Step9: Move block with index 3 (blue cube - right section)
Step10: Move block with index 7 (green vertical block)
Step11: Move block with index 9 (yellow vertical block)
Step12: Move block with index 9 (yellow vertical block)
Step13: Move block with index 4 (orange cube)
Step14: Move block with index 2 (red top piece with curve)
Step15: Move block with index 12 (yellow dome)
Step16: Move block with index 12 (yellow dome)
Step17: Move block with index 12 (yellow dome)
Step18: Move block with index 12 (yellow dome)
}
